troparia: (Tone 4) Your martyrs NAME, O Lord,* by their passion acquired the crowns of incorruptibility from You, our God.* For possessing Your power, they overcame the torturers* and shattered the feeble insolence of demons.* By their supplications, save our souls!
kontakia: (Tone 2) Appearing as radiant lights, O godly martyrs,* you illumine all creation with the brilliance of your miracles,* healing infirmities, always dispelling deep darkness* and praying unceasingly to Christ our God for all of us.
